body:
Comment 2: 
Correction: The test case for the erroneous out-of-bounds error messages should have
been:

package p

func f() {
	var a []int
	_ = a[1<<100]
	_ = a[1<<100:1<<200]
}

The incorrect error messages are the same:

x.go:5: constant 1267650600228229401496703205376 overflows int
x.go:6: constant 1267650600228229401496703205376 overflows int
x.go:6: constant 1606938044258990275541962092341162602522202993782792835301376 overflows
int
